languages.text: "Я вижу, ты потратил{mf||а} время в Темном городе не зря, как следует изучив наш... образ мышления". {n}Довольно ухмыляющийся Маражай кладет руки на клинки.{/n}
"I see you have not wasted your time in the Dark City, and you have properly studied our... way of thinking." {n}Smirking contentedly, Marazhai places his hands on his blade grips.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Я вижу, ты потратил{mf||а} время в Темном городе не зря, как следует изучив наш... образ мышления". {n}Довольно ухмыляющийся Маражай кладет руки на клинки.{/n}

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I see you have not wasted your time in the Dark City, and you have properly studied our... way of thinking." {n}Smirking contentedly, Marazhai places his hands on his blade grips.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Je vois que vous n'avez pas perdu votre temps dans la Cité Crépusculaire, et que vous avez étudié notre... philosophie. » {n}Marazhai vous adresse un sourire satisfait et pose sa main sur la poignée de son arme.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I see you have not wasted your time in the Dark City, and you have properly studied our... way of thinking." {n}Smirking contentedly, Marazhai places his hands on his blade grips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je vois que vous n'avez pas perdu votre temps dans la Cité Crépusculaire, et que vous avez étudié notre... philosophie. » {n}Marazhai vous adresse un sourire satisfait et pose sa main sur la poignée de son arme.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “看得出来，你在黑暗之城这段时间并没有浪费时间。你确实好好地研究过我们的……思维方式。”{n}玛拉斋露出了得意的笑容，将双手放在了两把刀的刀柄上。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I see you have not wasted your time in the Dark City, and you have properly studied our... way of thinking." {n}Smirking contentedly, Marazhai places his hands on his blade grips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “看得出来，你在黑暗之城这段时间并没有浪费时间。你已经好好地研究我们的……思维方式。”{n}玛拉斋露出了得意的笑容，将双手放在了两把刀的刀柄上。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「仄暗き都での時間は無駄ではなかったようだな。俺たちの考え方を…きちんと勉強してきたようだ」{n}満足げに微笑んで、マラズハイは剣の柄に手をかけた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I see you have not wasted your time in the Dark City, and you have properly studied our... way of thinking." {n}Smirking contentedly, Marazhai places his hands on his blade grips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「仄暗き都での時間は無駄ではなかったようだな。俺たちの考え方を…きちんと勉強してきたようだ」{n}満足げに微笑んで、マラズハイは剣の柄に手をかけた。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Wie ich sehe, habt Ihr Eure Zeit in der Dunklen Stadt nicht vergeudet und unsere ... Denkweise genaustens studiert." {n}Marazhai lächelt zufrieden und legt seine Hände auf Griffe seiner Klingen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I see you have not wasted your time in the Dark City, and you have properly studied our... way of thinking." {n}Smirking contentedly, Marazhai places his hands on his blade grips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Wie ich sehe, hat Ihr Eure Zeit in der Dunklen Stadt nicht vergeudet und unsere ... Denkweise genaustens studiert." {n}Marazhai lächelt zufrieden und legt seine Hände auf die Klingengriffe.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Veo que no has perdido el tiempo en la Ciudad Siniestra y has estudiado nuestra... forma de pensar». {n}Marazhai sonríe satisfecho y coloca sus manos en las empuñaduras de sus espadas.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I see you have not wasted your time in the Dark City, and you have properly studied our... way of thinking." {n}Smirking contentedly, Marazhai places his hands on his blade grips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Veo que no perdiste el tiempo en la Ciudad Siniestra y te empapaste de nuestra... forma de pensar». {n}Marazhai sonríe satisfecho y coloca sus manos en las empuñaduras de sus espadas.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Demek Kara Şehir'de vaktini boşa harcamamışsın, tam da bizim gibi düşünmeyi öğrenmişsin." {n}Memnun bir şekilde sırıtan Marazhai, elini bıçağının kabzasına götürüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I see you have not wasted your time in the Dark City, and you have properly studied our... way of thinking." {n}Smirking contentedly, Marazhai places his hands on his blade grips.{/n}

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
